body.name: The Great Lord Somaditya
body.description: I am a Full Stack Developer , I have 3 years of experience in Full Stack Development.

education.instituteName: Odisha University of technology and research
education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
Central Board of Secondary Education-Grade XII
Central Board of Secondary Education-Grade X

content: Configured and installed the backend with proactive solutions related to pagination,index-based searching, reducing the data flow, handling the APIs, and many more.
Facilitated customization of the system by developing role-level infrastructure for the website.
Contributed software engineering expertise in the backend development through the software lifecycle, from requirements definition through successful deployment.
Contributed to a game named 'Carbon Copy' developed using MERN stack and Web Sockets.
Got a hands-on experience with HTML Canvas, Game-based scoring patterns, timer, and delaying management.
I was engaged in the project as a Full-stack developer. 40% of my task was related to the backend,40% to the frontend, and the rest DevOps-related tasks .

projects.title: Classroom
content: Polished my backend skills related to ExpressJS, MongoDB, and general backend architecture
Developed an end-to-end app providing real-time delivery tracking,management, and analytics of student records
Worked closely with the designs to optimise usability and implement frontend.

projects.title: Bookshare
content: The project focused on lending and borrowing books with internet as a medium.
Engaged mostly in the integration of frontend and backend, database handling, firebase authentication, and deployment.
Managed a team of 4 regarding task distribution and continuous integration and delivery.

projects.title: Cyber Bank
content: In my first Project learned the basics of HTML, CSS, and JS and got hands-on experience.
Got a brief introduction to how version control systems such as Git and GitHub function.
Gained a lot of knowledge on the basics of web development.
